name: YOKO REDUX
description:
As I connected to the holonet, there is a message left by the contact. Infiltrate the complex and steal a serum in the hidden lab. The serum is known as Power Redux. He says that I’ll know it when I see it. To get into the building, there will be a nearby XRAY-D4 hovercar with a keycard inside. He’s implying the job will be easy. When jobs give you this little information, it never is easy.

Team:

  • LEVELS AND CHARACTERS BY OYIANAKIS
  • MUSIC BY MICHAEL KIM
  • DESIGN AND DEV BY JOSEFNPAT
  • NARRATION BY SUNSHINE

Controls:

  • WASD + SPACE
